products.title: iPhone 13 Pro
products.description: The iPhone 13 Pro features a stunning Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, Pro camera system, and up to 1TB of storage.

products.title: iPhone 13
products.description: The iPhone 13 offers a beautiful Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, advanced dual-camera system, and all-day battery life.

products.title: iPhone 12 Pro Max
products.description: The iPhone 12 Pro Max features a large Super Retina XDR display, A14 Bionic chip, Pro camera system with LiDAR scanner, and Ceramic Shield front cover.

products.title: iPhone 12 mini
products.description: The iPhone 12 mini packs big features in a compact design with a Super Retina XDR display, A14 Bionic chip, dual-camera system, and 5G capability.

products.title: iPhone SE (2nd generation)
products.description: The iPhone SE (2nd generation) combines the power of the A13 Bionic chip with the beloved design of the iPhone 8, featuring a Retina HD display and Touch ID.

products.title: iPhone 11 Pro
products.description: The iPhone 11 Pro delivers advanced performance with the A13 Bionic chip, Pro camera system, Super Retina XDR display, and all-day battery life.

products.title: iPhone XR
products.description: The iPhone XR features a Liquid Retina display, A12 Bionic chip, advanced Face ID, and a single-camera system with Portrait mode and Depth Control.
